definitions.example: Only a couple of intimates had ever read his writing.

definitions.definition: (in plural intimates) Women's underwear, sleepwear, or lingerie, especially offered for sale in a store.
definitions.example: You'll find bras and panties in the women's intimates section upstairs.
He intimated that we should leave before the argument escalated.
I will intimate you when the details are available.
He and his sister deeply valued their intimate relationship as they didn't have much else to live for.

definitions.definition: Of or involved in a sexual relationship.
definitions.example: She enjoyed some intimate time alone with her husband.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to details that require great familiarity to know.
